pkgmetadata.longdescription: # jeff-apiPython library for Jeff interaction. Supports both `jeff-qt` and `jeff-core`.## Installing from PyPi.org```bashpip install jeff-api```## Usage```pythonfrom jeff_api import server, clientsrv = server.Server(None, ext_port)cli = client.Client('localhost', jeff_port)data = srv.listen()cli.send_msg(data)``````pythonfrom jeff_api import client, server, scenariosrv = server.Server(None, ext_port)cli = client.Client('localhost', jeff_port)scn = scenario.Scenario(cli, srv, "Example scenario")```## Building```bashcd jeff-apipython -m pip install --upgrade buildpython -m build```
